diff_hunk:
@@ -66,23 +66,22 @@ build:gdr --define=with_gdr_support=true
 build:ngraph --define=with_ngraph_support=true
 build:verbs --define=with_verbs_support=true
 
+
 build --define=use_fast_cpp_protos=true
 build --define=allow_oversize_protos=true
 build --define=grpc_no_ares=true
 
-build --spawn_strategy=standalone
-build --genrule_strategy=standalone
-build -c opt
+
+#build --spawn_strategy=standalone
body: By the way, with no extra parameters to bazel command-line  and without "build -c opt" flag in bazelrc, TF seems to be building with -g0 -O2 -DNDEBUG .
body_html: By the way, with no extra parameters to bazel command-line and without "build -c opt" flag in bazelrc, TF seems to be building with -g0 -O2 -DNDEBUG .
body_text: By the way, with no extra parameters to bazel command-line  and without "build -c opt" flag in bazelrc, TF seems to be building with -g0 -O2 -DNDEBUG .
